view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Europress was a British magazine and software publisher based in Adlington, near Macclesfield, Cheshire. Their magazine publishing business was previously known as Database Publications. Among their titles was SNES Force, a magazine dedicated to the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: A magazine dedicated to the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.
